content: Blog Tool, Publishing Platform, and CMS | WordPress.org Malagasy WordPress.org Malagasy Toggle Menu About Blog Contact Download Home Install Plugins Themes Welcome Meet WordPress WordPress is open source software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or app. Beautiful designs, powerful features, and the freedom to build anything you want. WordPress is both free and priceless at the same time. Trusted by the Best 35% of the web uses WordPress, from hobby blogs to the biggest news sites online. Discover more sites built with WordPress Powerful Features Limitless possibilities. What will you create? Customizable Designs SEO Friendly Responsive Mobile Sites High Performance Manage on the Go High Security Powerful Media Management Easy and Accessible Extend WordPress with over 55 000 plugins to help your website meet your needs. Add an online store, galleries, mailing lists, forums, analytics, and much more. Community Hundreds of thousands of developers, content creators, and site owners gather at monthly meetups in 817 cities worldwide. Find a local WordPress community Get Started with WordPress Over 60 million people have chosen WordPress to power the place on the web they call “home” — join the family. Get WordPress News From Our Blog Olá, mundo! Welcome to WordPress.org. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging! It’s Easy As… Find a trusted web host and maybe support WordPress at the same time. Download & install WordPress with our famous 5-minute installation. Publishing has never been easier. Spend some time reading our documentation, get to know WordPress better every day and start helping others, too. WordPress Swag WordPress Users … and hundreds more About Blog Hosting Donate Support Developers Get Involved Showcase Plugins Themes WordCamp WordPress.TV BuddyPress bbPress WordPress.com Matt Privacy Public Code @WordPress WordPress Code is Poetry.

WordPress is both free and priceless at the same time. Matokia ny tsara indrindra 35% of the web uses WordPress, from hobby blogs to the biggest news sites online. Customizable Designs SEO Friendly Responsive Mobile Sites High Performance Manage on the Go High Security Powerful Media Management Easy and Accessible Extend WordPress with over 55 000 plugins to help your website meet your needs. Add an online store, galleries, mailing lists, forums, analytics, and much more. Fiarahamonina Hundreds of thousands of developers, content creators, and site owners gather at monthly meetups in 817 cities worldwide. Find a local WordPress community Manomboha mampiasa WordPress Over 60 million people have chosen WordPress to power the place on the web they call “home” — join the family. Mampiasà WordPress Vaovao farany tao amin'ny Blaogy It’s Easy As… Find a trusted web host and maybe support WordPress at the same time. Download & install WordPress with our famous 5-minute installation. Publishing has never been easier. Manokàna fotoana hamakiana ny tahirin-kevitra, afahanao manatombo isanandro ny fahalalanao ny WordPress mba afahanao manampy ireo hafa ihany ko. Fanamboarana Blaogy, Famoahan-dahatsoratra, ary CMS | WordPress.org Malagasy WordPress.org Malagasy Toggle Menu Mombamomba Blaogy Hisintona Handikateny Fandraisana Installation Plugins Serasera Bika 'Ndao hampiasa WordPress WordPress dia rindrankajy Open Source azonao ampiasaina hanamboarana tranonkala, blaogy na application faran’izay tsara. Tsara bika, matanjaka, ary anananao fahalalahana hanorina izay tadiavinao rehetra. Sady maimaimpoana ny WordPress no tsy voasanda vola. Matokia ny tsara indrindra 35% amin'ny web dia mampiasa WordPress avokoa, na blaogy fialam-boly hatramin'ireo tranonkala fampahalalam-baobao goavana indrindra. Jereo ireo tranonkala hafa mampiasa WordPress Zava-bita matanjaka Tsy misy fetra ny afaka atao. Inona no ho vokarinao ? Bika azo volavolaina Vonona amin'ny SEO Sahaza ny finday Zava-bita avo lenta Azo ampiasaina avy hatrany Fiarovana Mahery vaika Fitantanan-tsary Matanjaka Mora ampiasaina Hitaro ny tanjaky ny WordPress-nao amin'ny alalan'ny plugins maherin'ny 55 000 ahazoanao tranonkala mifanaraka amin'ny ilainao. Ampio tsena an-habaka, andian-tsary, mailing lists, forums, antontanisan'ny mpitsidika ary maro hafa. Fiarahamonina Mpikirakira kaody, mpanoratra, ary mpitantana tranonkala an-hetsiny no mifampotoana isam-bolana amina tanàna miisa 817 maneran-tany. Jereo ny vondrona WordPress akaiky anao Manomboha mampiasa WordPress Olona maherin'ny 60 tapitrisa no nisafidy hampiasa WordPress hampiodina ny tranonkala handrian'ny fony — Ianao sisa. Mampiasà WordPress Vaovao farany tao amin'ny Blaogy Tena mbola ilaina ve ny hanao tranonkala amin’ny teny malagasy ? WordPress no CMS mampiodina maherin’ny 35% an’ny tranonkala amin’izao fotoana izao, sady mora ampiasaina indrindra. Anisan’ny ahitana azy betsaka ireo tranonkala, hatramin’ireo tranokalan’ny andrim-panjakana maro eto amintsika. Saika teny français foana nefa matetika no fampiasa amin’ireny tranonkala ireny, na ireo mampiasa WordPress na tsia. Misy aza mahavita mitantana teny maro ankoatra ny français, toy ny […] Mora kely toy ny … Misafidiana mpampiatrano azo antoka sady mba manohana ny WordPress koa amin’izay. Sintony dia ampidiro WordPress anaty ny 5 minitra monja. Tsy mbola nisy fahamorana toa izany. Manokàna fotoana hamakiana ny tahirin-kevitra, hanatombo isanandro ny fahalalanao ny WordPress mba ahafahanao manampy ireo hafa ihany koa. Lamaody WordPress Mpampiasa WordPress … sy maro hafa Mombamomba Blaogy Fampiantranoana tranonkala Manomeza kely Fanampiana Mpikirakira kaody Mandraisa anjara Fampirantiana Plugins Bika WordCamp WordPress.tv BuddyPress bbPress WordPress.com Matt Fiainana manokana Public Code @WordPress WordPress Zava-kanto ny kaody

Sintony dia ampidiro WordPress anaty ny 5 minitra monja. Tsy mbola nisy fahamorana toa izany. Ampio tsena an-habaka, andian-tsary, mailing lists, forums, antontanisan'ny mpitsidika ary maro hafa. Fiarahamonina Mpikirakira kaody, mpanoratra, ary mpitantana tranonkala an-hetsiny no mifampotoana isam-bolana amina tanàna miisa 817 maneran-tany. Jereo ny vondrona WordPress akaiky anao Manomboha mampiasa WordPress Olona maherin'ny 60 tapitrisa no nisafidy hampiasa WordPress hampiodina ny tranonkala handrian'ny fony — Ianao sisa. Mampiasà WordPress Vaovao farany tao amin'ny Blaogy Tena mbola ilaina ve ny hanao tranonkala amin’ny teny malagasy ? WordPress no CMS mampiodina maherin’ny 35% an’ny tranonkala amin’izao fotoana izao, sady mora ampiasaina indrindra. Anisan’ny ahitana azy betsaka ireo tranonkala, hatramin’ireo tranokalan’ny andrim-panjakana maro eto amintsika. Saika teny français foana nefa matetika no fampiasa amin’ireny tranonkala ireny, na ireo mampiasa WordPress na tsia. Misy aza mahavita mitantana teny maro ankoatra ny français, toy ny […] Mora kely toy ny … Misafidiana mpampiatrano azo antoka sady mba manohana ny WordPress koa amin’izay. Sintony dia ampidiro WordPress anaty ny 5 minitra monja. Tsy mbola nisy fahamorana toa izany. Manokàna fotoana hamakiana ny tahirin-kevitra, hanatombo isanandro ny fahalalanao ny WordPress mba ahafahanao manampy ireo hafa ihany koa.
